chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro is experiencing the issue described above.

Thank you for your help,

Dear Backcare,

We have contacted our logistics partner about the cancellation of the order. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile,

I have received your message and I am waiting for your return to confirm the cancellation of the order.

Regards,
Ibrahim from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We have cancelled the order and refunded the customer. Thank you.

Regards,
AS
